mapper.select: SELECT c.prdt_id,c.user_id,p.cate_id,p.prdt_nm,p.prdt_img, p.prdt_title,co.color_nm AS prdt_color, p.prdt_price,c.cart_amount,c.cart_price FROM sh_cart_info c JOIN sh_member_info m ON c.user_id = m.member_id JOIN sh_product_info p ON c.prdt_id = p.prdt_id JOIN sh_product_color co ON p.prdt_color = co.color_id WHERE c.user_id = '${user_id}'
SELECT * FROM sh_cart_info WHERE user_id='${user_id}' AND prdt_id=${prdt_id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT nvl(max(cart_id), 0) + 1 FROM sh_cart_info
INSERT INTO sh_cart_info VALUES(${cart_id}, '${user_id}', ${prdt_id}, ${cart_amount}, ${cart_price})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sh_cart_info WHERE user_id='${user_id}' and prdt_id=${prdt_id}
